title: L Locker (Lollipop And KitKat) Premium 2.7 APK
description:
L Locker (Lollipop And KitKat) Premium 2.7 APK

L Locker is an Android L & KitKat style locker with many enhanced features, Easy, feature-rich, NO AD, with Parallax 3D effect, being the Best Android L & KitKat style locker.



Key Features



1. Lollipop (Android L) locker with rich features, highly customizable; also support KitKat style
2. Support set PIN or Pattern to enhance locker security, auto override HOME key, more secure
3. Support Android L style notifications
4. Quick control panel: quick to launch favorite apps, quick to adjust switch, quick to control music
5. Support config locker shortcuts to what you want
6. Support 3,4,5,6 number of configurable locker shortcuts
7. Support lockscreen wallpaper, custom wallpaper, with Parallax 3D effect
8. Quick launch Camera from locker with restricted access (from opened Camera, can not jump to Gallery)
9. Random keyboard in locker PIN UI, more secure
10. Support delayed lock, reduce unlock times
11. Support unlock effect
12. Missed call and unread message counter on locker
13. Support transparent status bar for Android 4.4 devices and some Galaxy devices
14. NO AD, nice design, memory and battery friendly



What's New



L Locker is the best Lollipop style (android 5.0 style) locker

1. Update the unlock animation to Lollipop style

2. Lollipop style Pattern lock
